name: Jewels Collect Blitz
description:
Jewels Collect Blitz is an addictive and delicious adventure filled with colorful gem crunching effects and well designed puzzles for you to play in subway time

FEATURES
• 3 MATCH PUZZLE
• TONS OF UNIQUE LEVELS
• EASY AND FUN PLAY
• NO TIME LIMIT
• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!
